description: This file defines a ProductsController class for handling HTTP requests related to product management, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting products, and calculating total inventory value. It exports an instance of this controller.

classes.name: ProductsController
classes.description: Controller class managing product-related API endpoints, providing methods for CRUD operations and inventory balance calculation.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET /products to list all products.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET /products/:id to retrieve a specific product by ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST /products to create a new product.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT /products/:id to update an existing product.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Handles DELETE /products/:id to delete a product.

methods.name: balance
methods.description: Handles GET /products/balance to compute total inventory value.
